sentence.Network_en: When automobiles become popular, the use of the horse and buggy passed away.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽车普及后, 就不再使用马和马车了.

sentence.Network_en: Cars are prohibited, so transportation is by electric cart or by horse and buggy.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽车禁行，所以运输就靠电动车或马车。

sentence.Network_en: It will make atomic power look like the horse and buggy.
sentence.Network_cn: 看起来很传统但能制造出原子能.
